inscription:
Mark, Inscription

Verso, account sheet, with date di 13 Agosto 1754 -- also carries the name Filippo delli Bentivogli
markings: Watermark: an anchor (?) in a small circle surmounted by a six-pointed star (partial), close to Heawood  5 or 6 (Rome, 17th century); similar to watermark identified by the Biblioteca Comunale dell'Archiginassio as Bolognese, 1709 (http://badigit.comune.bologna.it/filigrane/schede/164.htm)
medium: Pen and brown ink on laid white paper
provenance: Coll. Corner; Janos Scholz (?); [Charles E. Slatkin Galleries, New York]; David Daniels, New York, until 1965; gave to MIA
title: The Holy Family
